positions.subtitle: Infosys
positions.description: • Conducted comprehensive financial modeling and analysis, providing valuable insights for finalization of Annual plan by the Board.• Executed monthly analysis and reporting of the entity's performance, ensuring accuracy in MIS reporting.• Executed monthly revenue and cost variance analysis to enable forecasting and optimization.• Managed book closure within established timelines, overseeing statutory and internal compliance requirements for the entity.• Applied a focused approach to analyze and report intercompany transactions.• Led quarterly budgeting and forecasting process for the subsidiary including cash flow forecasting.• Facilitated timely completion of both statutory and internal audits by liaisoning with various teams across the organization.Technical Skills: Annual Budgeting, Financial Statement Analysis & Reporting, Cash Flow Management, Operational Analysis, Variance Analysis, SAP ERP
positions.title: Associate-Finance
positions.description_html:
• Conducted comprehensive financial modeling and analysis, providing valuable insights for finalization of Annual plan by the Board.
• Executed monthly analysis and reporting of the entity's performance, ensuring accuracy in MIS reporting.
• Executed monthly revenue and cost variance analysis to enable forecasting and optimization.
• Managed book closure within established timelines, overseeing statutory and internal compliance requirements for the entity.
• Applied a focused approach to analyze and report intercompany transactions.
• Led quarterly budgeting and forecasting process for the subsidiary including cash flow forecasting.
• Facilitated timely completion of both statutory and internal audits by liaisoning with various teams across the organization.
Technical Skills: Annual Budgeting, Financial Statement Analysis & Reporting, Cash Flow Management, Operational Analysis, Variance Analysis, SAP ERP

experience.title: Manager- Capital
experience.description: • Conducted monthly analysis of financial performance with a focus on revenue and operations, contributing to strategic decision-making.• Implemented a systematic approach to monthly asset deployment analysis, ensuring maintenance of deployment percentage and maximizingyield on investment.• Conducted monthly debt balance reconciliations, ensuring timely repayments and enabling accurate cash flow forecasting.• Coordinated efforts to streamline investor onboarding and contract completions, enhancing overall operational efficiency.• Played a key role in the restructuring of investor repayment schedules on both financial and legal fronts, facilitating successful refinancing of thecompany.• Analyzed funding agreements, evaluating their legal, financial, and operational implications enabling finalization and investor onboarding.Technical Skills: Revenue analysis, Operational Analysis, Investor Relations Management, Tally ERP

experience.title: Article Assisstant
experience.description: • Assisted in financial analysis and audits of companies spanning telecommunications, banking, insurance, road and infrastructure development,consultancy services, as well as iron and steel sectors.• Examined financial records, ensured accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.
